thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Kellogg Pulls Out of Venezuela, Citing Its ‘Deterioration’

author: Mayela Armas
title: Kellogg Pulls Out of Venezuela, Citing Its ‘Deterioration’
text:
CARACAS, Venezuela—Kellogg Co., citing the “deterioration” of a country in the midst of an economic meltdown, said Tuesday it was closing operations that employed 400 workers and produced the majority of the breakfast cereal consumed by Venezuelans.
“The current economic and social deterioration in the country has now prompted the company to discontinue operations,” the Battle Creek, Mich.-based company said.
Workers...
